ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RIGHT(Web_Site__c , 4) <> ".COM", RIGHT(Web_Site__c , 4) <> ".com", RIGHT(Web_Site__c , 4) <> ".ORG", RIGHT(Web_Site__c , 4) <> ".org", RIGHT(Web_Site__c , 4) <> ".NET", RIGHT(Web_Site__c , 4) <> ".net" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Web Site must have an extension of .com, .org, or .net.
